Index.meta_title: bluGoat - AI-Powered custome Audience  Generation Platform to Find Your Perfect Prospects
Index.meta_description: bluGoat helps businesses discover qualified leads with precision targeting and AI-enriched audience member. Specify your criteria and access actionable business intelligence instantly.

Hero.title: Finding your <ai>perfect audience</ai>? Just ask us.
Hero.description: C Custom audiences for Meta, Google, WhatsApp and more in seconds – just answer a few questions.

Features.section_title: Powerful Custom Audience At Your Fingertips
Features.section_description: Our AI-powered platform identifies your ideal custom audience tailored to your exact specifications, helping you connect with the right customers and grow your business.
Features.feature1_description: Our proprietary algorithm analyzes digital footprints across platforms, while our pattern recognition technology identifies behavioral similarities to generate your perfect target audience. Your ideal audience has patterns. Our AI spots them. Your campaigns convert them.
Features.feature2_description: Simple 5-question discovery process that helps you find your perfect audience in minutes, not months. Quickly define your ideal customer parameters and get immediate results you can act on.
Features.feature3_description: Generate custom lookalike audiences based on your best-performing customer segments. Create exportable audience profiles ready for multiple campaigns across different platforms.
Features.feature4_description: The eventual outcome for you is ad spend optimization. We help you by providing a custom audience for budget allocation across platforms, ensuring your marketing dollars work harder and deliver measurable results.
Features.feature5_description: Audience expansion capabilities that grow with your business. Multi-product audience differentiation lets you target distinct segments, while our enterprise-level audience management tools support even the most complex marketing operations.
Features.feature6_description: Integrate our custom audience discovery tools directly into your existing workflow with our developer-friendly API.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Perfect Plan for Your audience Generation Needs
Pricing.section_description: Access quality prospect data with flexible plans designed to scale with your business - from startups to enterprise organizations.

FAQ.question1: How accurate is your custom audience data?
FAQ.answer1: Our lead data boasts over 95% accuracy, thanks to our proprietary AI verification system and regular database updates. We continuously verify contact information and company details to ensure you always work with reliable, up-to-date information.
FAQ.question2: How does the audience query pricing work?
FAQ.answer2:
Our platform operates on a simple, transparent pay-per-audience model with no hidden fees:

1. **Direct Pricing**: We charge as little as ₹2 per contact in your custom audience, with the final price depending on the specificity and complexity of your query.

2. **No Subscription Required**: There are no monthly fees or minimum commitments. You only pay for the audiences you request.

3. **Quality Guarantee**: You'll receive a sample of your matched data within 2-4 hours of your request. You only purchase the full dataset if it meets your requirements.

4. **Volume Discounts**: The more contacts you need, the more cost-effective our service becomes. Bulk orders receive preferential pricing.

5. **Enterprise Solutions**: We offer custom enterprise plans for companies with high-volume or specialized needs.

**Example**: If you request 5,000 contacts of "Software Engineers in Bangalore with 5+ years experience", your cost would range from ₹10,000 to ₹25,000 depending on the complexity of the criteria.
FAQ.answer3: Our platform covers audience across all major industries including technology, healthcare, finance, education, retail, manufacturing, and many more. Our extensive database allows you to filter prospects by specific industry classifications to find exactly what you need.
FAQ.question4: Can I integrate your data with my CRM?
FAQ.answer4: You will be able to soon. We're working on offering you seamless integration with popular CRM platforms, including Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, and many others. Our API will allow for custom integrations with virtually any system your team uses.
FAQ.answer5: Our pricing is based on the number of audience memeber you need and additional enrichment features. We offer monthly and annual subscription plans with significant discounts for annual commitments. Custom enterprise pricing is available for high-volume requirements.

CTA.title: Ready to supercharge your prospecting with bluGoat?
